The following is the 2007 winning entry from an annual contest at Texas A&M 
 University calling for the most appropriate definition of a contemporary 
 term. 
 
 This year's term: 
 
 Political Correctness. 
 
 "Political Correctness is a doctrine, fostered by a delusional, illogical, 
 liberal minority and rabidly promoted by an unscrupulous mainstream media, 
 which holds forth the proposition that it is entirely possible to pick up a 
 turd by the clean end."
I guess this is why Texas is knee-deep in turds. emoticon_xagree
